content: X-S G3 MX Collated nails Ultimate-performance collated nails for fastening to steel using the GX 3 gas nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate-performance nail for steel Long, conical tip and high hardness – for excellent fastening quality Applications Fastening to steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 3/16 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 3/16 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.12 in | Point type | Long conical tip | Approvals | ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | GX 3 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 3539467 - Gas nail X-S 14 G3 MX (900) + GC 41 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 900x Gas nail X-S 14 G3 MX - 1x Gas can GC 41 for GX 3 - 2330348 - Gas nail X-S 14 G3 MX - Package Size 900 pc - 2330346 - Gas nail X-P 20 G3 MX - Package Size 900 pc - 2330347 - Gas nail X-P 17 G3 MX - Package Size 900 pc - 3674619 - 1/2 pallet BULK 97K X-S 14 GX3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 97200x Gas nail X-S 14 G3 MX - 108x Gas can GC 41 for GX 3
